com.unimelb.swen30006.mailroom

Interface DeliveryStrategy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleDeliveryStrategy

    public interface DeliveryStrategy
    A basic interface to allow delivery bots to query multiple delivery strategies for selecting the next floor to go to, based on current floor and on the remaining items to be delivered within the storage box.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int chooseNextFloor(int currentFloor, StorageBox box)
      Select the next floor to deliver to based on the items within the storage box.

    • Method Detail

      • chooseNextFloor

        int chooseNextFloor(int currentFloor,
                  StorageBox box)
                    throws SourceExhaustedException
        Select the next floor to deliver to based on the items within the storage box.
        Parameters:
        currentFloor - the floor the delivery bot is currently on
        box - the box of remaning mail items
        Returns:
        the optimal floor to deliver to based on this strategy
        Throws:
        SourceExhaustedException - if there is no mail left in the given storage box
